channel.title: Will host a server
channel.description:
Hi all, I'm really bored and want to be part of a server, So what i propose to do is host your server for you.
you will have owner rights etc.. Your acc will be owner and the client/server will be set up by you.
Post a reply if your interested in me hosting it for you.
However, I can only host 1 server!
Hosting times will most likely be 24/7

item.title: Will host a server
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Just host your own server, if they can’t host it themselves, they should purchase a dedicated server.

Read full topic
